CREATE TABLE words ( id INTEGER NOT NULL, spelling TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE, language_id INTEGER,
PRIMARY KEY (id) FOREIGN KEY (language_id) REFERENCES languages(id) );

CREATE TABLE translations ( id INTEGER NOT NULL, word_from INTEGER, word_to INTEGER, memory_id INTEGER,
PRIMARY KEY (id) FOREIGN KEY (word_from) REFERENCES words(id) FOREIGN KEY (word_to) REFERENCES words(id) FOREIGN KEY (memory_id) REFERENCES memories(id) );
INSERT INTO languages(id, name) VALUES (1, \'pl\'); INSERT INTO languages(id, name) VALUES (2, \'eng\');
